post.body: Thanks! Happy Anniversary!
Thanks much! We're glad to be back!
I will miss the 365 blog. Trying to decide if I think I can pull-off a video a day (or maybe once a week).
Thank you darling! Good to BE back! For a few minutes there I was pretty sure I'd die in West Virginia.
Thank you!! How are you feeling?
THANK YOU!! :D
That sounds deliciously delighful.
It very well should at least be considered.
hahaha.. either one. Depends what situations I encounter tomorrow. Rest assured, I will be prepared.
I know it, but the thought of adding more hours to the trip was not appealing! 17 is long enough! :)
hahah good to know!
Did you see my Flickr photos of @grimjaw and Alan w/ @reginaldgolding?
She's pretty hooked on the new one.
Oh. My. Goodness. I am *SO* glad to be home.
On I-68 in MD -@reginaldgolding is driving ;)
2 more cars off the road
Just passed car flipped over on it's roof
Wow- I-68 in MD/WV is terrible. Snow-covered and slippery
God bless Soap & Glory's "Sugar Crush" body scrub and blueberry thrill body butter. I feel like a new woman.
How many times in one day can a person watch/listen to "Little Mermaid II" without losing it? I'll let you know, I'm getting close.
